title: Art attack 2
creator_credit: Nick Bigsby, Neil Buchanan, Tim Edmunds, Television South and Media Merchants
brief_description: Learn how to be creative with art - techniques which seem complex are explained simply and with great illustration. Be creative in a fun way, using cheap, everyday objects. In this episode topics covered include cartooning - learn how to draw animal caricatures and different cartoon bodies, and splash out with splash art - learn how to brighten up dull clothes.
creator_credit_for_label: Nick Bigsby, Neil Buchanan, Tim Edmunds, Television South and Media Merchants
